data.title: Last Stand 40th Anniversary Edition (Box Set) by Cold Chisel
data.meta_description: Buy Last Stand 40th Anniversary Edition (Box Set) by Cold Chisel from The Sound of Vinyl AU
data.text:
Includes:

1. Last Stand (2LP)

2.The Barking Spiders Live: 1983 (1LP)

3. Last Stand Out-Takes (1LP)

4. CD-DVD Gatefold

5. Poster (A2)

6. Randomly selected 1 of 3 collectable print

Last Stand was Cold Chisel's final tour before their breakup in 1983.

The tour consisted of 28 dates and culminated in a four-night extravaganza at the Sydney Entertainment Centre. Two nights of the Sydney shows were recorded and later released as a live album and documentary film, capturing the band's electrifying performance without any unnecessary fluff.

Last Stand holds a special place in Cold Chisel's legacy, celebrated by fans and critics alike for its production values and killer sound. The recordings from the tour are now available in the Last Stand - 40th Anniversary Box Set, which includes additional tracks never released before on CD or vinyl, as well as photos, posters, and a laminate.

Whether a long-time fan or a newcomer to their music, the Last Stand - 40th Anniversary Box Set is a must-have for anyone who appreciates the impact Cold Chisel has made on Australian music.

SIDE A

1. Standing On The Outside (Live)

2. Cheap Wine (Live)

3. Khe Sanh (Live)

4. Janelle (Live)

5. Only One (Live)

6. Twentieth Century (Live)

SIDE B

1. Tomorrow (Live)

2. Rising Sun (Live)

3. Choirgirl (Live)

4. You Got Nothing I Want (Live)

5. Bow River (Live)

SIDE C

1. Flame Trees (Live)

2. Star Hotel (Live)

3. Wild Thing (Live)

SIDE D

1. Saturday Night (Live)

2. River Deep Mountain High (Live)

3. Goodbye (Astrid Goodbye) (Live)

4. Don't Let Go (Live)

5. Let's Go Get Stoned (Live)

The Barking Spiders Live: 1983 (LP)

1. Merry-Go-Round (Live)

2. You Got Nothing I Want (Live)

3. No Sense (Live)

4. Hold Me Tight (Live)

5. Tomorrow (Live)

6. Forever Now (Live)

7. Standing On The Outside (Live)

8. Bow River (Live)

9. It's Only Make Believe (Live)

10. Twentieth Century (Live)

11. Taipan (Live)

12. Georgia (Live)

Last Stand Out-Takes (1LP)

SIDE A

1. Wild Colonial Boy

2. Letter To Alan
